title: Blocky geometric numerals
content:
Hi guys,

I'm interested in the font used for the dates on these posters for Chop Shop by Martin Martonen.  
 [http://www.martinmartonen.com/index.php?/projects/chop-shop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702/http:/www.martinmartonen.com/index.php?/projects/chop-shop/ "http://www.martinmartonen.com/index.php?/projects/chop-shop/")

It looks like it could be Futura or Avenir, but it's not ;)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-06-22%2017_4739.01.18.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-06-22%2017_4204.04.16.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-06-22%2017_6297.04.33.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-06-22%2017_6444.04.40.png)

Font: 

 ITC Avant Garde Gothic (Bold Condensed) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: manofscience

comments.content: They look like **[ITC Avant Garde Gothic (Bold Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162702/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=ITC%20Avant%20Garde%20Gothic%20Std%20-%20Bold%20Condensed&fid=37fa2a79f94d8fbf3f10ff066537ae33&fsize=60&text=10%2F7%2024%2F7%207%2F8%2021%2F8&wrap=2)**
